advisories.affected_versions: All versions before 1.11.1, all versions starting from 1.12.0 before 1.12.2, all versions starting from 1.13.0 before 1.13.2, all versions starting from 1.14.0 before 1.14.2, all versions starting from 1.15.0 before 1.15.2, all versions starting from 1.16.0 before 1.16.2
advisories.credit: Mike McLean and Patrick Uiterwijk of Red Hat
advisories.description: SQL injection vulnerabilities have been found in multiple call handlers in Koji’s hub code. An anonymous attacker can use these vulnerabilities to issue arbitrary database commands.
advisories.title: SQL injection in multiple remote calls
